name: private void Start()
description:
Yo dawg, I heard you liked game development, so I developed a game about developing the game you’re developing

In this game you get to play as a game developer. You have 48 hours to shape your own world. Write code to unlock new tools and decorations, but make sure to also maintain your health! Eat, sleep and dance to control your stats. Oh, and coffee! As any game jam contributor knows, there can never be enough coffee!

A game made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 45 with the theme "Start With Nothing".
